original_text: And the channels of the sea appeared, the foundations of the world were discovered, at the rebuking of the Lord, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.
korean_text: 이럴 때에 여호와의 꾸지람과 콧김으로 말미암아 물 밑이 드러나고 세상의 기초가 나타났도다

sentences.original_text: And the channels of the sea appeared
the foundations of the world were discovered
at the rebuking of the Lord
at the blast of the breath of his nostrils
